main event: A bright, round, whitish object was observed moving overhead at a high rate of speed in Columbus, Ohio on 31 July 1961.
interesting points: The object traveled from east to west at high speed, appearing at an altitude of 25,000 to 30,000 feet., It was glowing white and left a vapor trail approximately 10 to 15 feet wide., The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes before the object disappeared., No wings or other structural features were visible on the object., Weather conditions were clear with no clouds at the time of the sighting.
witness description: a local resident of Columbus, reporting through the USAF Command Post
